sense.def:
Success
je to, da naredimo ali dosežemo nekaj, kar smo poskušali narediti ali doseči.

seg.quote: His attempt to shoot the president came very close to success.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj ali nekdo
has achieved success
, je dosegel pomemben položaj ali zaslužil oziroma prinesel veliko denarja.

seg.quote: Confidence is the key to success.
His next film—‘Jaws’—was a tremendous success.
